synopsis.text:
Produced by Studio Kajino, a Studio Ghibli offshoot, and directed by MOMOSE Yoshiyuki, this captivating animated music video is the third creation inspired by capsule's NEXUS-2060 concept - a futuristic space station resort set in the year 2060. Released in conjunction with the single "Aeropolis" on September 7, 2005, and first aired alongside the live-action Touch movie on September 10, 2005, this visual spectacle takes viewers on an unexpected journey.

Our story follows a young girl on her way to a wedding, utilizing advanced interstellar transportation. However, a minor glitch sends her plummeting towards an alien world below. In this strange new environment, she finds herself amidst a chaotic construction site for a flying city, witnessing a major upheaval.

Surrounded by peculiar automatons, her adventure takes an intriguing turn when she encounters a charming man. As they navigate this unfamiliar landscape together, the girl embarks on a thrilling and unforgettable escapade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
